pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydrating Nourishing Facial Moisturiser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hyper Hydrators + Antioxidants + Essential Fatty Acids + Nourishing Butters. A unique complex of three Australian native extracts purposeful picked to deliver essential fatty acids and antioxidants to transform dull, dry skin to fresh, dewy and hydrated.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime delivering vitamin C and EFA rich Kangaroo Paw • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Naturally occurring natives rich in vitamin C and AHA’s to reveal clear skin • Essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to strengthen the skin’s barrier and lock in moisture • Antioxidant rich Rosehip to defend against the everyday stressors • A hyper hydration combination of creamy Shea, Cocoa, Avocado, Sesame and Wheat Germ to offer long lasting moisture and a protective layer that ensures you wake up with silky soft skin.

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Syzygium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Arctium Lappa Root (Burdock) Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus Flower/Leaf (Kangaroo Paw) Extract, Urtica Dioica Leaf (Nettle) Extract, Vanillin, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol* Limonene* Linalool*

Directions

After cleansing, gently massage into face, neck and décolletage
